bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ban 斑 , macule. Tang ye ben cao 湯液本草 Xu 序：醫壘元戎、陰證略例、 癍論萃英、錢氏補遺等書，安樂之法，湯液本草統之 , “The approaches to peace and happiness documented in books such as Yi lei yuan rong , Yin zheng lue li , Ban lun cui ying , (“A Collection of the Best Writings on Macule-Ilnness ”), and Qian shi bu yi are all gathered in the Tang ye ben cao ”.
